TEXT.TITLE: SOYBEAN SUPPLY/DEMAND BY COUNTRY -- USDA
TEXT.BODY:
The U.S. Agriculture Department
detailed world supply/demand data for major importers and
exporters of soybeans, by country, as follows in mln tonnes --
